page.title: 11Farming
page.content: Farming in the Ashton area is very good.The soil is rich and the land is flat.We estimate there are about 10 large farms in our block.A typical farm is Village Farm which is in the heart of Ashton.The farm has stood for many years but extensions have been built on.Dairy cattle are kept and vegetables such as early potatoes are grown.Wheat and barley are also important.Mr Dobson has owned the farm for 32 years.It has been in his wife's family for 2 generations.There are 72 to 84 cows.Sometimes they have to cross the road to their fields and come back at 15:00 for milking.The farm has lots of machinery including tractors,combine harvesters,grass cutters and potato harvesters.People from the village are employed on the farm.2 men work full time and Mr. Dobson also works on the farm.
